lead_paragraph: Neon green bats with lightning bolts, helmets paying homage to Cal, Clemente and Cool Papa Bell. A rotation full of relievers, a designated runner for pitchers.

headline.print_headline: Baseball's Crystal Ball: Colorful Bats, Rejiggered Rotations
headline.main: Baseball's Crystal Ball: Colorful Bats, Rejiggered Rotations
